name: Splash of Art
summary: A deluge of colorful illusory paint, tools, or other symbols of art and artisanship drift down in the area.
description: A deluge of colorful illusory paint, tools, or other symbols of art and artisanship drift down in the area. Roll 1d4 to determine the color of the illusion. Each creature in the area must attempt a Will save. A creature is unaffected on a success.
